QuestData.Title: Delivery Device
QuestData.Description: As fate would have it, there's a special deed that needs doing - one that will benefit the Cenarion Circle as well as myself.$b$bYou see, $c, I am under pressure to create a special... concoction, shall we say. I believe my work to be complete, but I need to have it tested to be certain.$b$bThe target of this test is to be the naga, who threaten this region from the west. Their demise would surely aid the Circle.$b$bFirst though, I need a delivery device. Hollow horns from the dying kodo should do nicely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Maurin Bonesplitter wants you to collect 3 Hollow Kodo Horns from Dying Kodo.
